name: Kingdom Defense
description:
'Kingdom Defense' is a pixel style tower defense game. Players can build and upgrade various defense towers to block the enemy's attack.
[Game Operation]
Click to operate.
[Game features]
Each type of defense tower has different attributes and attack methods. Players need to reasonably match different defense towers to give full play to their power, so as to block the enemy's attack.
Every time an enemy reaches the end point, a point will be deducted. When the score is 0, the game will fail.
The defensive tower will be more powerful after upgrading. The game will become more and more difficult with the increase of levels.
